observation: Tradinggene  言語を選択 日本語 アイスランド語 翻訳 Home About Why Us Login Create Account Plans Company FAQ Terms Of Use Privacy Policy Contact Get Started Invest, Trade & Earn Interest Diversify your portfolio with a true multi-asset broker. Discover the power of earning in an increasing trading ecosystem. Journey To Financial Freedom Trade and Invest with world’s most popular and professional brokerage company. Let us walk you to the path of financial freedom. Investment Profitability With quick access to historical data, we exploit winning patterns in the trading market by placing orders at a lightning pace with excellent predictive power which guarantees maximum profitability. Previous Next About Us Tradinggene is founded with vision to create 100 percent transparent digital trading experience for its clients. We always had the idea that the investment industry was missing more broad-minded business values. Tradinggene has a very forward-thinking approach and has always adopted a very flexible business philosophy which has helped us tap into different sectors of the investment sector with great success. Our company is interested in successful and prosperous traders who will create high trading volume. We are proud that we helped many customers to make revenue. We utilize our wealth of knowledge and expertise to help manage your account and all its data Maintain full access to your account from managing your personal details to investments and making withdrawals. With quick access to historical data, we offer lighting quick order executions Our system has a robust security infrastructure and we store the vast majority of the user data in secure access storage. 11,927,235 Investors 178 Countries 40,927,182 Deals 1,701,372 Active Building trust is important and to ensure you know you are protected, Legitimatecryptotrading has employed regulation and state-of-the-art technology for you to trade with confidence. Referral Bonus Remember to use the referral link. Build your structure and receive a commission whenever someone makes a deposit. Earnings from the affiliate program are immediately available in the account balance. You can withdraw funds at any time. Risk Management We've developed an extensive range of risk-management features to help you manage investment risk effectively, helping to secure potential profits and minimise losses. Innovative Platform We're constantly improving our investment platform, trying to make it the best on the market. Our clients make massive investments daily. Professional Guidance One-on-one support from an experienced investment strategist. Strong Security All data on financial operations as well as personal data are effectively protected with DigiCert Inc SSL certificates. Payment Options We provide various deposit and withdrawal methods for easy payments. How It Works Just 3 simple steps to success. It has never been easier. 01 Open An Account It is easy and free. Fill the “Registration” form and you’re good to go. 02 Fund Investment Fund your Investment through any of the available Payment gateways. 03 Withdraw Profit Swift withdrawal of your profit after successful investments. Market Analysis Get the most out of fundamental and technical analysis with our News Feed and Economic Calendars. More than 100 most widely-used technical indicators. Always stay up-to-date on what is happening in financial markets with our customizable price alerts. Investment Plans Check out our amazing auto-trading plans. Dont know how to trade? Leave that to Us. Basic $ Daily Analytical Market Update Reliable Customer Suppor Investment Alerts Buy Now Bronze Silver Gold Diamond F.A.Q Frequently Asked Questions How do I become a Member? This can be done quickly and easily. Click the Registration button and fill out a simple form, after which a welcome email will be sent to your e-mail address. Using the registration data, log in to your Member's Area, where you can carry out all activities related to management of your account. Can I own more than one account? Registration of two or more Member's Areas with identical personal data is classified as creation of multiple accounts (multi-accounts). We do not support the intentional creation of multi-accounts for reasons of openness and transparency. A multi-account is also when the same person registers a second account under different names in order to obtain the affiliate reward bypassing his/her upline (the partner who referred you to the company's website). In the case of registering 2-3 accounts for the same IP address, we will ask the owners of accounts with similar IP addresses to document their identity (e.g. passport, driving license or bank statement) and answer a phone call to avoid incrimination. If any user is caught creating multi-accounts, we will refund his or her money, write off the affiliate reward from the upline and terminate our cooperation with all persons appearing in the chain of multi-accounts. What payment options are available? Currently, you can choose between the following options for deposits and withdrawals: Bitcoin, several electronic payment systems (Paypal and Skrill), Bank related such as(Wire Transfer, Western Union and Moneygram) and Credit/Debit Card Payment. To view the current list of available options for deposits and withdrawals, please log in to your Account. Are there any deposit bonuses? Yes. Deposit bonuses are given when users meet certain requirements. How soon will my deposit reflect? Your account will be updated instantly as you deposit. For Bitcoin deposits you should send actual amount to shown Bitcoin wallet, and your deposit will be added after 3 confirmations ,it can take from 10 minutes up to 1 hour. Also send a proof of payment to Us via the link shown on deposit page in member area. How can I withdraw funds? You need to login to your account, then click "Cashout". Select your preferred payment mBankod, after which you would input an amount and then click "REQUEST". Our system will send money Within 24 Hours after request. Do I need to provide documents for withdrawal? The security team has the right to request a scanned image or digital photo of the first page of a valid ID card, as well as additional documentation (a photo of a credit card, a photo of you holding your passport open at the photo page, a screenshot of your electronic wallet) to make sure that the account details and documentation belong to the person requesting the withdrawal. Can I withdraw my principle amount? Yes. Your principal amount is always added to your profit. Testimonials What some of our users say Jena Karlis Store Owner Customer care is top notch. They have a range of plans so you can buy the one that fits into your burget. Matt Brandon Freelancer Before i struggled to maintain a good standard of leaving but when i found this company my life has change for the better. John Larson Entrepreneur Thank you for all your support and assitance, have now closer than ever in achieving my dream of becoming passive income earner. Saul Goodman Ceo & Founder It's a good company and very profitable,not to mention the smooth deposit and withdrawal process. Sara Wilsson Designer This company is marvelous. it's totally awesome. I never regret coming here, is really a great place to invest. ‹ › We are happy to support you Address 17 Fluton Street, New York 535022, USA Email support@worldcryptocurrency.trade Loading Your message has been sent. Thank you! Send Message 17 Fluton Street Useful Links Risk Disclosure The performance data quoted represents past performance. Past performance is no guarantee of future results. The Fund recently experienced significant negative short-term performance due to stock market volatility associated with the COVID-19 pandemic. Investment return and principal value will fluctuate so that an investor's shares upon redemption may be worth more or less than their original cost. thought: The text extracted contains several red flags that align with characteristics of scam websites. There are claims of high profitability, a focus on recruitment through referral bonuses, and unusually high numbers of investors and deals. The payment options include less commonly used gateways for such investment platforms, like Western Union and Moneygram, which are unusual for legitimate investment firms. The website also mentions quick and guaranteed returns, which is suspicious.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain registration details are redacted for privacy, which is not unusual, but it can be a tactic used by scam websites to hide their identity. The domain was registered recently and employs a privacy service to shield the registrant's information. While this is not definitive proof of a scam, it adds to the suspicious nature of the website.

The DNS record only shows an HINFO record which doesn't provide much information about the legitimacy of the website. It is neither a clear indicator of a scam nor does it confirm legitimacy. To further validate the legitimacy of the website, it would be beneficial to check for any certificates that may lend credibility to the site.

thought: The certificate information shows that the domain has a certificate issued by ZeroSSL, which is a legitimate certificate authority. However, the presence of a certificate does not necessarily mean a website is legitimate; it only indicates that the data transferred between the user and the site is encrypted. I should search for any online discussions or reports that might indicate whether this website has been involved in scams.

There are no results from the Reddit search regarding "tradinggene.net scam," which means there's no immediate public discussion or reports on Reddit that could help us assess the legitimacy of the website. Since the Reddit search yielded no results, I should try searching on a different platform to see if there is any mention of the website.

There are no results from the Twitter search regarding "tradinggene.net scam," which means there's no immediate public discussion or reports on Twitter that could help us assess the legitimacy of the website. Given the information gathered from the website's content, WHOIS data, DNS record, and certificate, along with the absence of public reports on social media, it's time to conclude based on the indicators of a scam website. I now know the final answer. Based on the extracted text from the website, which includes claims of high profitability, referral bonuses, unusual payment options, and guaranteed returns, as well as the recent registration of the domain and the use of privacy services to hide registrant information, the website https://tradinggene.net/ shows multiple red flags that are characteristic of scam websites.

observation.reason: The website exhibits numerous signs of being a scam including promises of high returns referral incentives non-standard payment methods and vague language about investment risk management. Additionally the use of privacy services to hide the registrant's information and the recent domain registration date add to the suspicion. Despite having a valid SSL certificate the overall evidence suggests that the website is likely a scam.
